member.name: CCAB
member.summary: The CCAB structure contains cabinet information.

member.name: CCAB.cb
member.summary: The maximum size, in bytes, of a cabinet created by FCI.

member.name: CCAB.cbFolderThresh
member.summary: The maximum size, in bytes, that a folder will contain before a new folder is created.

member.name: CCAB.cbReserveCFHeader
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the CFHeader reserve area. Possible value range is 0-60,000.

member.name: CCAB.cbReserveCFFolder
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the CFFolder reserve area. Possible value range is 0-255.

member.name: CCAB.cbReserveCFData
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the CFData reserve area. Possible value range is 0-255.

member.name: CCAB.iDisk
member.summary: The maximum size, in bytes, of a cabinet created by FCI.

member.name: CCAB.setID
member.summary: A value that represents the association between a collection of linked cabinet files.

member.name: CCAB.szDisk
member.summary: The name of the disk on which the cabinet is placed.

member.name: CCAB.szCabPath
member.summary: The full path that indicates where to create the cabinet.
